spells.name: mind slash
spells.description: Slash your foe to make them vulnerable.
spells.short_description: Slash your foe to make them vulnerable.

spells.name: blurred frenzy
spells.description: Strike your foe with a flurry of strikes, distorting the space around you, allowing you to evade attacks.
spells.short_description: Strike your foe with a flurry of strikes allowing you to evade attacks.

spells.name: ilusionary leap
spells.description: Summon an illusion that leaps at your target, crippling them. After the initial leap, the clone will execute the Mind Slash sword chain.
spells.short_description: Summon an illusion that leaps at your target, crippling them.

spells.name: illusionary riposte
spells.description: Block your foe and create an illusion when attacked.
spells.short_description: Block your foe and create an illusion when attacked.

spells.name: phantasmal swordsman
spells.description: Perform a sword strike and create an illusion that attacks your foe. If the sword strike hits, you gain might.
spells.short_description: Perform a sword strike and create an illusion that attacks your foe. If the sword strike hits, you gain might.

spells.name: mirror strikes
spells.description: Inflict bleeding and torment on your target.
spells.short_description: Inflict bleeding and torment on your target.

spells.name: lingering thoughts
spells.description: Spin forward and strike multiple times, inflicting conditions and leaving a clone at your starting position
spells.short_description: Spin forward and strike multiple times, inflicting conditions and leaving a clone at your starting position

spells.name: wand of symmetry
spells.description: You and all your clones shadowstep to a random location around your target and strike, applying confusion.
spells.short_description: You and all your clones shadowstep to a random location around your target and strike, applying confusion.

spells.name: ether clone
spells.description: Deliver a damaging attack directly to your target. Summon a clone that casts Ether Bolt and inflicts torment.
spells.short_description: Deliver a damaging attack directly to your target. Summon a clone that casts Ether Bolt and inflicts torment.

spells.name: illusionary counter
spells.description: Block the next attack and counter by inflicting torment and creating two clones that cast Ether Bolt.
spells.short_description: Block the next attack and counter by inflicting torment and creating two clones that cast Ether Bolt.

spells.name: counterspell
spells.description: Shoot out a bolt that blinds foes in a line and summons a clone to attack the first foe it strikes..
spells.short_description: Shoot out a bolt that blinds foes in a line and summons a clone to attack the first foe it strikes..

spells.name: the prestige
spells.description: Disappear in a cloud of smoke, blinding nearby foes and losing conditions. Reappear three turns later, burning nearby foes.
spells.short_description: Disappear in a cloud of smoke, blinding nearby foes and losing conditions. Reappear three turns later, burning nearby foes.

spells.name: phantasmal mage
spells.description: Strike and burn nearby foes. Create an illusion that releases a massive wave of fire that burns, confuses, and interrupts foes.
spells.short_description: Strike and burn nearby foes. Create an illusion that releases a massive wave of fire that burns, confuses, and interrupts foes.

spells.name: phase retreat
spells.description: Teleport away from your target, summoning a clone that casts Winds of Chaos.
spells.short_description: Teleport away from your target, summoning a clone that casts Winds of Chaos.

spells.name: phantasmal warden
spells.description: Create a phantasm that throws axes at nearby targets and creates a defensive bubble, protecting itself and allies from projectiles.
spells.short_description: Create a phantasm that throws axes at nearby targets and creates a defensive bubble, protecting itself and allies from projectiles.

spells.name: ether's friend
spells.description: Heal yourself when you summon an illusion.
spells.short_description: Heal yourself when you summon an illusion.

spells.name: feedback
spells.description: Create a dome around your foes that reflects projectiles.
spells.short_description: Create a dome around your foes that reflects projectiles.

spells.name: decoy
spells.description: Gain stealth and summon an illusion to attack your foe..
spells.short_description: Gain stealth and summon an illusion to attack your foe.

spells.name: mirror images
spells.description: Summon two clones to attack your foe.
spells.short_description: Summon two clones to attack your foe.

spells.name: null field
spells.description: Create a field of energy that rips boons from foes and cures conditions on allies.
spells.short_description: Create a field of energy that rips boons from foes and cures conditions on allies.

spells.name: arcane thievery
spells.description: Send three conditions you have to your foe and give them slow
spells.short_description: Send three conditions you have to your foe and give them slow

spells.name: blink
spells.description: Teleport to a target location.
spells.short_description: Teleport to a target location.

spells.name: illusion of life
spells.description: Gives allies Illusion of Life at the target location, allowing them to get up from downed state and keep fighting
spells.short_description: Gives allies Illusion of Life at the target location, allowing them to get up from downed state and keep fighting

spells.name: power spike
spells.description: Damage your target and nearby foes. Inflict vulnerability on foes.
spells.short_description: Damage your target and nearby foes. Inflict vulnerability on foes.

spells.name: power cleanse
spells.description: Remove conditions from you and nearby allies.
spells.short_description: Remove conditions from you and nearby allies.

spells.name: phantasmal defender
spells.description: Summon an illusion that taunts your target and all nearby targets while blocking. When it finishes blocking, the illusion explodes, dealing increased damage for each attack it blocked.
spells.short_description: Summon an illusion that taunts your target and all nearby targets while blocking. When it finishes blocking, the illusion explodes, dealing increased damage for each attack it blocked.
